data.text: @Arightside Although he did tons of good work, the plain and simple truth is he’s a serial rapist.
@Arightside Based on evidence he was not guilty.

@Arightside The culture at that time was free love, rat pack, Hefner, need I name a Pres. The MSM covered them all up and the rest of society were puritanical. Very, very sad as we really did think of him as Dr. Huxtable😞

@IamDamianP @Arightside 1) It's a life sentence, 2) Life sentence 4 his family as well, 3) Women r no longer property, 4) Man's Inhumanity To Man & Woman, 5) Fear now there is ONE conviction, there will not be much after this. 6) Fathers teach your sons....Henry cannot do what Billy does. @Shermichael_
@Arightside Big lesson to young men that are looking to become leaders and public figures.
